description:
Rear garden tree works subject to Bethanie No. 63 TPO 1985 subject to Bethanie No. 63 TPO 1985. 

 Works:  Lime (T11)   Crown lift 6m., crown thin 30% - 40%,                      crown reduce to previous cutting                      points, remove horizontal laterals                      growing directly towards building,                      deadwood. 

         Lime (T12)   (Heavily Decayed at Base) - fell. 

         Lime (T13)   Crown lift 6m., crown thin 30% - 40%,                      crown reduce to previous cutting                      points, remove horizontal laterals                      growing directly towards building,                      deadwood.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The tree shall be felled to ground level and the entire stump and any roots over 100mm diameter shall be grubbed out. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
